parts.text: Can you provide information about the intended number of servings for this product?
What is the typical portion size for each serving of this product?
Are there any guidelines on how many people this product can accommodate?
How many servings can I expect to get from this product?
Are there any recommendations on the number of guests or participants this product is suitable for?
Is there a suggested group size for using this product?
Could you tell me the ideal number of individuals that this product is intended for?
How many people is this product designed to serve?
